section.heading: Uniform form of written financing statement and amendment.

para.text: Except for a reason set forth in § 28:9-516(b), a filing office that accepts written records may not refuse to accept a written record for a filing authorized by this article if the record conforms to a format that is:
Currently approved by the International Association of Commercial Administrators; or
Adopted by rule issued by the Chief Financial Officer pursuant to § 28:9-526.

annotations.annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 19-302: Section 4 of D.C. Law 19-302 provided that the act shall apply as of July 1, 2013.
The 2013 amendment by D.C. Law 19-302 rewrote (a) and (b).
